title: Tom Dreesen: Sinatra’s Favorite Comedian
itunes:title: Tom Dreesen: Sinatra’s Favorite Comedian
description:
With more than 60 appearances on The Tonight Show, to touring with Sinatra for over a decade, Tom Dreesen is as legendary as it gets in comedy. In the last episode of 2021, Tom teaches Jeremy a lifetime’s worth of showbiz knowledge.

Remember, send us an email at jpiven@kastmedia.com or leave us voicemail at  https://www.speakpipe.com/jpiven to be featured during “Rolling Calls with Ari Gold” where Jeremy answers questions from the listeners as Ari Gold. 

IG: https://www.howulivinjpivenpodcastshow
Twitter: https://www.howulivinjpivshow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HowULivinJPiven/
Tom's IG: https://www.instagram.com/tomdreesencomic

No long-term commitments or contracts. Go to https://www.stamps.com, click the microphone at the top of the page, and enter code PIVEN.
